F

FileHelper - Class in info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io
The |FileHelper| is a static class which helps managing file paths.
fileName(String) - Static method in class info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io.FileHelper
Gets the filename of the given path.
FileReader - Class in info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io
The |FileReader| is responsible to read the content of a whole file.
FileReader(String) - Constructor for class info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io.FileReader
Constructor which sets the specified path to the _path variable.
FileWriter - Class in info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io
A |FileWriter| writes data to a file.
FileWriter(String, boolean) - Constructor for class info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io.FileWriter
Constructor which sets the path and whether the message should be appended to the file or not.
find(File, Pattern) - Static method in class info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io.FileHelper
Lists files and directories with a name matching the regexp recursively.
find(String, Pattern) - Static method in class info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io.FileHelper
Lists files and directories matching the RegExp recursively.
find(String, String) - Static method in class info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io.FileHelper
Lists files and directories matching the RegExp recursively.
folderIsEmpty(File) - Static method in class info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io.FileHelper
Checks if a folder is empty.
folderIsEmpty(String) - Static method in class info.michaelkohler.helpertools.io.FileHelper
Checks if a folder is empty.
